name: Dice Domain
description:
God does not play dice. I do.
- Baron Von Datum

You are Baron Von Datum, the most heinous villain in the whole county of Alea's Port. Unleash your latest evil invention, the majestic Die-Cey, on the oblivious population of the neighboring cities.

How to use a Die-Cey:

Muhahahaha! The Die-Cey is so technologically advanced that is indistinguishable from a normal dice. I mean, except the fact that it is 100 meters tall. And that sometimes explodes.

Just drag the Elast-O-Matic (patent pending) with your mouse to load the Die-Cey and release to bring destruction to those stupid monkeys. Muahahaha!

But Beware, you fool! The Die-Cey needs power, so you have a limited number of shots to cause as much destruction as possible!

What do you mean with "Explodes"?

The Die-Cey is equipped with a multitude of horrifying weapons that activate whenever you roll a specific number. Here is the list:

I. Bullet Dice!

When rolling 1, the Die-Cey becomes supercharged. The next shot will disintegrate everything on its path.

II. Clones!

You know what's better than 1 Die-Cey? Four of them! The next shot will generate three additional destructive Die-Ceys (slightly under-powered versions, unfortunately.)

III. MegaDice!

Sometimes you just need to obliterate everything on a vast area. A half a km Die-Cey may help.

IV. Exploding Clones!

You know what's better than many Die-Ceys? Many EXPLODING ones! Every clone left on the city soil will explode, obliterating everything nearby.

V. Dynamite!

...Or you could just use your main Die-Cey. It's only one, but the effect is considerably stronger!

VI. Second Chance!

My grandma always used to say: "Sometimes you need another two shots with your enormous dice!". Weird woman. To honor her, rolling a 6 with the Die-Cey will give you two additional shots.

What should I destroy then?

EVERYTHING! Spread destruction! Scatter dread! And remember: you are a super-villain! Hospitals and sensitive targets will increase considerably fear in the general population! And if you happen to destroy a Nuclear Plant or a Firework Factory....Muhahahaha!


Challenge: Do you feel like a supervillain? Try the Metropolis map on Overlord difficulty and post here your Dread score!
